vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Hiv(?) of the Canaanites, first mentioned at Gen.10.17; descended from Canaan (H3667); along with Sidon (H6721), Heth (H2845), Jebusite (H2983), Amorite (H0567), Girgashite (H1622), Arkite (H6208), Sinite (H5513), Arvadite (H0721), Zemarite (H6786) and Hamathite (H2577)
§ Hivite = "villagers"
6th generation of descendants of Canaan, the son of Ham, who were living in northern Canaan near Mount Hermon at the time of the conquest
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希未人 这个陽性名詞 種族名稱在希伯來文的意思是 "村民"
迦南的第六代子孫, 含的兒子; 以色列在迦南征戰時期, 這些人居住於迦南
北方靠近黑門山之處
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希未人 这个阳性名词 种族名称在希伯来文的意思是 "村民"
迦南的第六代子孙, 含的儿子; 以色列在迦南征战时期, 这些人居住于迦南
北方靠近黑门山之处
